box1.title:
Technical
Services
box1.modalDesc: Technical Expertise in Software Development, System Design, and Agile Methodologies
box1.modalService1: Experience in software development principles focused on creating manageable and scalable solutions.
box1.modalService2: Understanding of system design, data structures, and methodologies within agile development teams (e.g., Scrum).
box1.modalService3: Engage in code reviews, both providing and receiving critical technical feedback.
box1.modalService4: Understanding customers' challenges and formulating technical solutions in a clear and simple way.
box1.modalService5: Understanding of Windows OS family, software deployment, and OOP principles.

box2.title:
Professional
Services
box2.modalDesc: Strong Interpersonal and Professional Skills for Effective Collaboration, Communication, and Results-Driven Performance.
box2.modalService1: Excellent teamwork abilities and a proven track record of fostering a positive work environment to achieve shared goals.
box2.modalService2: Attention to detail, a passion for skill improvement, responsibility and punctuality.
box2.modalService3: Strong ability to work independently, plan, and drive the work forward to achieve results in a pragmatic manner.
box2.modalService4: Strong communication skills and can explain technical solutions to both technical and non-technical audiences.
box2.modalService5: Fluent in Swedish and English, both verbally and in writing.
